videos.name: HTML tutorial for complete beginners: The document structure

exercises.title: Set up a personal website
exercises.content: You will setup a basic HTML document with the correct practices as the foundation for a personal portfolio website. Also set the website's title to your name. You won't see it in CodeWise's editor, but it would be present on a web page. Then, enter text to introduce yourself.
exercises.solution:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>John Doe</title>
  </head>
  <body>I'm John Doe, a frontend engineer with over 13 years of experience at big tech companies such as Google, Microsoft, and Meta. Outside of work, I enjoy walking my dog and playing video games.</body>
</html>

exercises.title: Quote site
exercises.content: Setup a simple HTML document including one of your favorite quotes. Name the website after who said the quote (e.g., "Nelson Mandela Quotes")
exercises.solution:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>Nelson Mandela Quotes</title>
  </head>
  <body>"Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world." - Nelson Mandela</body>
</html>
